title: Critical Security Warning: Your Crypto Seed Phrases Are Not Safe
summary: FIP Crypto warns that common storage methods for seed phrases including screenshots, password managers, and hot wallets are fundamentally insecure. A single compromise can lead to permanent loss of all crypto assets and on-chain identity, highlighting the critical need for better security practices.

title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Limitations in the Age of AI Agents
summary: Adeniyi.sui discusses the limitations of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for AI agents, suggesting it's insufficient for the evolving needs of AI agent infrastructure. The post includes a video component exploring these technical challenges in detail.

title: Bitcoin Supply Shock: Sellers Running Out of BTC
summary: Viktor predicts an imminent Bitcoin supply shock, suggesting that sellers will soon exhaust their Bitcoin holdings. This analysis implies potential significant price movements as supply dynamics shift in the market.
